name: ahead
posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

dsense.name: ahead
dsense.posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

example.eg: The road ahead is very busy.
Turn left at the traffic lights, and you'll see the hospital straight ahead.
example.egtrans: 在交通灯那儿左转，正前方就是医院，你一眼就能看见。

example.eg: Rick walked on ahead of us.
You go on ahead of (= before) me, and I'll meet you there.
example.egtrans: 你先走，我们在那儿会合。

trans_examp.trans_en: having more points, votes, etc. than someone else in a competition, election, etc.
trans_examp.trans_cn: （在比赛或竞争中）领先，占优势

example.eg: Apparently, the latest opinion polls put the Democrats 15 percent ahead of the Republicans.
example.egtrans: 据最近的一次民意测验显示，民主党领先了共和党15个百分点。

example.eg: Barcelona was ahead after ten minutes.

trans_examp.trans_en: making more progress than someone else

example.eg: Sophie is way (= far) ahead of the other children in her class.
example.egtrans: 索菲的成绩远远超过班上其他孩子。

dsense.name: ahead
dsense.posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

example.eg: She has a difficult time ahead of her.
example.egtrans: 以后她会面临一段艰难的日子。

example.eg: He couldn't bear to think of the lonely year ahead.
example.egtrans: 今后一年要一个人孤零零地度过，他一想到这个就受不了。
